entry.title: "Recursive covenant" with CTV and CSFS
entry.summary: In the realm of Bitcoin development, a fascinating conversation revolves around the nuanced role that transaction submission plays in the ecosystem. The process, which can occasionally be perceived as irksome, holds the potential to empower new applications by necessitating the transaction submitter's contribution to the outputs. This mechanism serves various purposes, one of which includes acting as a deterrent against griefing, thereby fortifying the resilience of statechains. Additionally, it paves the way for innovative methods to harness yield through mechanisms such as blind merged mining within surfchains. These insights, shared among members of the Bitcoin Development Mailing List, underscore the evolving dynamics of blockchain technology and its capacity to foster novel solutions in the digital asset space.
